results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእናንተ (ወደ በጎ ነገር) መቅደምን ወይም ወደ ኋላ መቅረትን ለሻ ሰው (አስፈራሪ ስትኾኑ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ነፍስ ሁሉ በሠራችው ሥራ ተያዥ ናት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
